title: A French Company Is Using Enzymes To Recycle One of the Most Common Single-Use Plastics - Slashdot
description: In late September, Carbios, a French startup, opened a demonstration plant in central France to test the use of enzymes to recycle PET, one of the most common single-use plastics and the material used to make most beverage bottles.
